sys_script_include.name: user_details

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1707de2883fd8610edb56060ceaad3ba
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383179_tradenow.user_details</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>user_details</name><script><![CDATA[var user_details = Class.create();
user_details.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    requestor_info: function() {
        var result = this.newItem("result");
        var logged_user = gs.getUserID();
        var user_detail = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        user_detail.addQuery('sys_id', logged_user);
        user_detail.query();
        while (user_detail.next()) {
            result.setAttribute("user", user_detail.sys_id);
            result.setAttribute("phone", user_detail.phone);
            result.setAttribute("email", user_detail.email);
            result.setAttribute("location", user_detail.location);
        }
    },
    type: 'user_details'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jagriti</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-23 04:46:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>1707de2883fd8610edb56060ceaad3ba</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>user_details</sys_name><sys_package display_value="TradeNow" source="x_1383179_tradenow">48d5320c837d0610edb56060ceaad314</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="TradeNow">48d5320c837d0610edb56060ceaad314</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1707de2883fd8610edb56060ceaad3ba</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jagriti</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-23 04:50:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
